title: War on inflation not over, need to see how El Nino plays out, says RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das
description:
RBI Governor Das

The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Shaktikanta Das, on May 24 said the war against inflation is not over yet and the central bank is watching how the El Nino factor is playing out as the situation is very dynamic, implying that this can have an impact on the course of inflati...
